settings.name: Reference time
settings.description: Select a reference time towards which your data are evaluated. Default is NOW.

settings.name: Track time duration.
settings.description: Provide a time duration (in days) of how far in the past you want to plot your track(s).

settings.name: Reference longitude
settings.description: Provide the longitude of the reference position to which daily distances will be calculated. If none provided, the last position of each track is used.

settings.name: Reference latitude
settings.description: Provide the latitude of the reference position to which daily distances will be calculated. If none provided, the last position of each track is used.
